item.title: Combining basketball IQ & data analysis to fill out a March Madness bracket
item.description: This is how I filled out my 2021 March Madness bracket combining my own college basketball knowledge with a model I made using data analysis. To begin, I used the programming language R and loaded up 3 useful libraries. I also set the random seed to be 1016, for my favorite number 10 and the number of my favorite NHL player, Aleksander Barkov, 16. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.
